informationOne: Here at enso we are glad you want to form part of our big family! And as in each good family - we like to take care of our own people.
informationTwo: We offer you to rent this room without paying a cash deposit, so you can spend your money on whatever you feel like!
informationThree: With enso moving is easy, quick and affordable. All you need to do is fill this short form out… and DONE!
cardSubtitle: Remember, you must list the account where you receive your income
adviceText: * Authorization only, limited to the amount of 1 month of rent
terms1: By sending the information above you confirm you have read and accept the
sucessOne: You are already part of Enso!
successTwo: Guille will be in touch with you shortly regarding the rent contract.
successThree: In the meantime, enso’s team is here for you in case you need anything.
successFour: It’s time to enjoy the best experience of your life!
